package.name: Math_Complex
package.summary: Classes that define complex numbers and their operations
package.description: Classes that represent and manipulate complex numbers. Contain definitions for basic arithmetic functions, as well as trigonometric, inverse trigonometric, hyperbolic, inverse hyperbolic, exponential and logarithms of complex numbers.

release.notes: Fixed bug in Math_ComplexOp::createFromPolar() (reported by Nicolas Vollmar, nvollmar@ee.ethz.ch). Made changes to the use of get_class(), it will now work equally well in PHP 4 and PHP 5. In PHP 4 that function returns all lowercase, in PHP 5 is properly capitalized, using strtolower() to make it homogenous. Added UML diagram for package and unit tests that use PHPUnit 1.0
